description: Related to enumeration of edge-rooted catafusenes.
comments: Binomial transform of the first differences of the Catalan numbers (see A000245). - _Paul Barry_, Feb 16 2006Starting (1, 5, 21,...) = A002212, (1, 3, 10, 36, 137,...) convolved with A007317, (1, 2, 5, 15, 51,...). - _Gary W. Adamson_, May 19 2009
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
B. N. Cyvin et al., A class of polygonal systems representing polycyclic conjugated hydrocarbons: Catacondensed monoheptafusenes, Monat. f. Chemie, 125 (1994), 1327-1337 (see Eq. 6).

S. J. Cyvin et al., Enumeration and Classification of Certain Polygonal Systems Representing Polycyclic Conjugated Hydrocarbons: Annelated Catafusenes, J. Chem. Inform. Comput. Sci., 34 (1994), 1174-1180.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
